member.name: T:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback
member.summary: Represents a single knockback instance. Add to to activate.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Active
member.summary: Setting this to false will immediately end the knockback.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Angle
member.summary: The angle of the knockback in radians.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.SpeedDropoff
member.summary: The amount of speed lost per (0.03125).

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Effect1
member.summary: This effect will be spawned every 1.0 seconds on the target using .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Effect2
member.summary: This effect will be spawned every 0.125 on the target using .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Effect1AttachmentPoint
member.summary: The attachment point to use for .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Effect2AttachmentPoint
member.summary: The attachment point to use for .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.#ctor(War3Api.Common.unit,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Knocks the target the given distance towards the given angle (in degrees) over the given duration.
member.param: The target to perform the knockback on
The distance in units to knock the target back
The duration in seconds over which the target should be knocked back

member.name: M:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.#ctor(War3Api.Common.unit,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Knocks the target the given distance towards the given location over the given duration.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Action
member.summary: Called by the system. Do not call yourself.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback.Merge(WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback)
member.summary: Merges the force of the given knockback into this knockback. Typically though, you can also just have both knockbacks active simultaneously and achieve the same effect.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Knockbacks.KnockbackSystem
member.summary: Keeps track of all active knockbacks.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Knockbacks.KnockbackSystem.Add(WCSharp.Knockbacks.Knockback)
member.summary: Adds the given knockback to the system. This will also initialise or alter some values according to the knockbacks' properties.
